@@ -51,6 +51,14 @@ function average(l, field) {
   return sum / l.length;
 }
 
+function rpad(str, len, chr) {
+  if (chr === undefined)
+    chr = ' '
+  while (str.length < len)
+    str += chr;
+  return str;
+}
